name: Power (melonllama)
description:
Small puzzle game like the game "Flow" on the app store if you ever played that.

Controls and rules:

  • use "wasd" to move the orb around.
  • when you are on a colored plug press "e" in order to possess it.
  • when you possess it move it around and get it to the correct colored outlet.
  • when you are an outlet you cannot go through wires, but in orb form you can.
  • when you are over an outlet press "e" again stop possessing it.
  • you go to the next level when all the plugs are in the correct outlets.\
  • there are only 3 levels.

Almost gave up while trying to make this game, but I persevered and I am glad to say that I finished it.

It doesn't have any sound and there is no menu screen so it kind of just throws you in.

I wish that I could have added more levels and maybe another coat of polish to the game, but I did what I could with the time given to me.
